meanings.definition: A small ball used in the game of foosball.
meanings.sent1: The foosballs rolled quickly across the table during the intense game.
meanings.sent2: Players need to keep an eye on the foosballs to score goals.
meanings.sent3: The foosballs decided to have a race to see which one was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The foosballs were like tiny planets orbiting the poles of the table.
meanings.sent5: The colorful foosballs gleamed under the bright lights of the arcade.

meanings.definition: The plural form of foosball, referring to multiple balls used in the game.
meanings.sent1: She counted the foosballs before starting the match to ensure they were all there.
meanings.sent2: The foosballs scattered across the floor when the table was accidentally bumped.
meanings.sent3: The foosballs held a meeting to discuss strategy for the upcoming tournament.
meanings.sent4: The foosballs resembled a group of friends always sticking together.
meanings.sent5: The shiny foosballs clinked together as players aimed for the goal.
